dcterms:description: Our industrial Multi-Scenario Short Video (MSSV) dataset in Taobao. Data from 2022-03-24 to 2022-04-04 is utilized for training and 2022-04-05 for testing. We evaluate models on two dense scenarios (denoted as #A1 and #A2) with abundant user behaviors and two spare scenarios (#A3 and #A4) with sparse data.
dcterms:title: Ali-MSSV

dcterms:creator: Xiao Ma
Liqin Zhao
Guan Huang
Zhi Wang
Zelin Hu
Xiaoqiang Zhu
Kun Gai
dcterms:description: A public dataset released by Taobao with prepared training and testing set. We split the dataset into 3 scenarios according to scenario id, denoted as #B1 to #B3 for simplicity.
dcterms:title: Ali-CCP

dcterms:creator: Kun Gai
Xiaoqiang Zhu
Han Li
Kai Liu
Zhe Wang
dcterms:description: A public dataset released by Alimama, an online advertising platform in China. Data from 2017-05-06 to 2017-05-011 is utilized for training and 2022-05-11 for testing. We arrange the dataset into 5 scenarios according to the city level, denoted as #C1 to #C5 for simplicity.
dcterms:title: Ali-Mama
